title: 78/411/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 April 1978 on the refusal to accept the scientific character of an apparatus described as 'Tektronix logic analyzer, type 7 D01'
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 13 April 1978  on the refusal to accept the scientific character of an apparatus described as "Tektronix logic analyzer, type 7 DO1"  (78/411/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Tektronix logic analyzer, type 7 DO1" is not considered to be a scientific apparatus.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
